alert.note: Alert for Florence; Inland Georgetown; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Florence and Williamsburg Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sardis, or 12 miles southwest of Florence, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lake City, Kingstree, Timmonsville, Quinby, Mars Bluff, Cades, Cartersville, Florence Darlington Technical College Main Campus, Hebron, New Hope, Trio, Salters, Sardis, Hyman, Effingham, Francis Marion University, Gourdin, Friendfield and Claussen. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 140 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 148 and 166, and between mile markers 168 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
